com.example.painintheass.Graphics.Particles

Class Particle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.painintheass.Graphics.Particles.Particle
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Star

    public class Particle
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Particle. A particle's only function is to move a certain way and fade away.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Particle

        public Particle(int x,
                int y,
                int imgIndex,
                double fadeSpeed)
        Creates a particle.
        Parameters:
        x - Position on x axis
        y - Position on y axis
        imgIndex - Index of particle's image
        fadeSpeed - Speed at which the particle fades
